intro: Discover a magical world full of secrets and hidden treasures!
description:
Hidden Legends is an exciting hidden object game that will take you to a colorful fantasy world full of cute and charming characters. Explore fairy-tale villages, mysterious deserts, distant islands, harsh northern lands, pirate coves and picturesque waterfalls, uncovering secrets and finding hidden objects. Each level of the game was created by hand to give a unique experience and a sense of real adventure.

Hundreds of hours of exciting gameplay await you thanks to a huge number of objects to find. Atmospheric music and colorful graphics immerse you in the magical world of the game, and convenient controls with touch screen support make the search process intuitive and comfortable.

Game features:

• More than 2,500 unique objects to search for.
• Unique levels made by hand and filled with details.
• Colorful fantasy graphics and charming characters.
• Atmospheric music that creates a feeling of complete immersion.
• Convenient controls with touch screen support.
• Ideal for fans of hidden object games and quiet exploration.
